Install in Minutes

A single install script patches your panel and sets up Notur. Extensions install with one Artisan command.

üß©

Full-Stack Extensions

Extensions can register PHP routes, migrations, middleware, event listeners, and React frontend components.

Frontend Slot System

Nine predefined slots let extensions inject widgets, navigation items, and full pages into the panel UI.

Registry & Distribution

Discover and install extensions from a GitHub-backed registry. Package your own extensions as .notur archives.
